desc: Magnum boots specialises in uniform, uniform safety and industrial work boots, shoes and trainers. Meeting and exceeding EU footwear standards for Occupational Safety ENISO 20347 and Safety Footwear ENISO 2035, Magnum is fit for purpose footwear.

layout.text: Ultima 6.0 WP - 100% Recycled Nylon Upper - Vegan Friendly
